text:
Fast Track Mahila Court, Tiruvannamalai handed out life imprisonment to a man charged with uxoricide here on Wednesday.

R.Vijayaraj (40), of Erayur Village near Pachal allegedly demanded money, to buy liquor, from his wife Amsa (25). As she refused, he allegedly attacked her with a sickle.

She died immediately on 29 September 2009 and Pachal police booked a case.

P.U.Chemmal, Judge of Fast Track Mahila Court who heard the case delivered judgment on Wednesday. He handed out life imprisonment and a fine of Rs.1,000 fine. - Staff Reporter
title: Man gets life term for killing wife
